TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpSessionState extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpSessionState Implements ICollection
public ref class HttpSessionState sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HttpSessionState = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供对会话状态值以及会话级别设置和生存期管理方法的访问。

span.span: Provides access to session-state values as well as session-level settings and lifetime management methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了会话状态管理，使你可以存储多个请求间关联与唯一的浏览器会话的信息。ASP.NET provides session-state management to enable you to store information associated with a unique browser session across multiple requests. 您可以存储值引用键的名称或数字索引的集合。You can store a collection of values referenced by a key name or by numerical index. 会话值和功能的访问权限是可使用类，该类可通过访问属性与当前，或属性。Access to session values and functionality is available using the class, which is accessible through the property of the current , or the property of the . 会话数据均关联有特定的浏览器会话使用的唯一标识符。Session data is associated with a specific browser session using a unique identifier. 默认情况下，此标识符存储在不过期的会话 cookie 在浏览器中，但您还可以配置你的应用程序通过设置存储在 URL 中的会话标识符`cookieless`归于`true`或元素中应用程序配置。By default, this identifier is stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser, but you can also configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL by setting the `cookieless` attribute to `true` or in the element of your application configuration. 您可以确定是否支持 cookie 的浏览器通过指定的值的 ASP.NET为`cookieless`属性。You can have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are supported by the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 您还可以确定是否启用 cookie 的浏览器通过指定的值的 ASP.NET为`cookieless`属性。You can also have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are enabled for the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 如果支持 cookie，则当已指定，或者当已启用指定，则的会话标识符将存储在 cookie 中，否则为将在 URL 中存储的会话标识符。If cookies are supported when is specified, or enabled when is specified, then the session identifier will be stored in a cookie; otherwise the session identifier will be stored in the URL. 在第一个请求期间开始会话和会话值将保持不变，只要新请求时，由浏览器中指定的分钟数之前属性传递。Sessions are started during the first request and session values will persist as long as a new request is made by the browser before the number of minutes specified in the property pass. 新的会话开始时，该会话引发事件。When a new session begins, the session event is raised. 此事件可用于执行任何额外的工作会话，例如，设置会话值的默认值的开头。You can use this event to perform any additional work at the start of a session, such as setting default session values. 如果会话超时调用方法时，或 ASP.NET 应用程序已关闭，会话引发事件。When a session times out, the method is called, or the ASP.NET application is shut down, the session event is raised. 此事件可用于执行任何必要的清理。You can use this event to perform any necessary cleanup. 引发事件时，才会话状态`mode`设置为。The event is raised only when the session state `mode` is set to . 若要提高性能，使用 cookie 的会话不分配会话存储的数据实际存储到之前对象。To improve performance, sessions that use cookies do not allocate session storage until data is actually stored in the object. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 会话状态不会保留在 ASP.NET 应用程序边界。Session state does not persist across ASP.NET application boundaries. 如果浏览器导航到另一个应用程序时，将会话信息不可用的新应用程序。If a browser navigates to another application, the session information is not available to the new application. 默认情况下，会话值存储在 Web 服务器上的内存。Session values are stored in memory on the Web server, by default. 也可以将会话值存储在 SQL Server 数据库、 ASP.NET 状态服务器或自定义服务器。You can also store session values in a SQL Server database, an ASP.NET state server, or a custom server. 这使您可以保留在其中 ASP.NET 或 IIS 进程或 ASP.NET 应用程序重新启动的情况下的会话值并使会话值可在 Web 场中的所有服务器。This enables you to preserve session values in cases where the ASP.NET or IIS process or the ASP.NET application restarts and to make session values available across all the servers in a Web farm. 通过设置来配置此行为`mode`属性为有效的应用程序配置元素中的值。This behavior is configured by setting the `mode` attribute to a valid value in the element of your application configuration. 有关详细信息，请参阅[会话状态模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4). 会话状态的替代方法包括应用程序状态 (请参阅属性) 和 ASP.NET 缓存 (请参阅命名空间)，可以访问的 ASP.NET 应用程序的所有用户的存储区变量; ASP.NET 配置文件 (请参阅命名空间)，该用户将值保留在数据存储区不会过期它们使用超时;ASP.NET ，其中保留中的控件值;;属性; 和 HTML 窗体上字段的可从 HTTP`POST`使用集合。Alternatives to session state include application state (see the property) and the ASP.NET cache (see the namespace), which store variables that can be accessed by all users of an ASP.NET application; the ASP.NET profile (see the namespace), which persists user values in a data store without expiring them using a time-out; ASP.NET , which persist control values in the ; ; the property; and fields on an HTML form that are available from an HTTP `POST` using the collection. 有关会话状态和其他状态管理备选方法之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理建议](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af79fa0d-4bc8-47a6-9915-d8e355bfb732)。For more details on the differences between session state and other state-management alternatives, see [ASP.NET State Management Recommendations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af79fa0d-4bc8-47a6-9915-d8e355bfb732). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置，并从会话状态中检索值。The following code example sets and retrieves values from session state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpSessionState#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/session2cs.aspx#30)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpSessionState#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/session2vb.aspx#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 取消当前会话。

span.span: Cancels the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次调用方法、 当前会话不再有效，可以启动一个新的会话。Once the method is called, the current session is no longer valid and a new session can be started. 导致事件被引发。 causes the event to be raised. 一个新将在下一个请求上引发事件。A new event will be raised on the next request. 默认情况下，正在更新已放弃或已过期的会话的会话标识符。Session identifiers for abandoned or expired sessions are recycled by default. 也就是说，如果发出请求，包括已过期或已放弃会话的会话标识符，被启动新会话使用相同的会话标识符。That is, if a request is made that includes the session identifier for an expired or abandoned session, a new session is started using the same session identifier. 您可以通过设置来禁用此`regenerateExpiredSessionId`到配置元素属性的`true`。You can disable this by setting `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute of the configuration element to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[会话标识符](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/146ca206-d151-4f2e-a548-bcca05ccf0cb)。For more information, see [Session Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/146ca206-d151-4f2e-a548-bcca05ccf0cb). 支持事件时，才属性设置为。The event is supported only when the property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`参数引用现有的会话状态项，现有项，将覆盖具有指定`value`。If the `name` parameter refers to an existing session state item, the existing item is overwritten with the specified `value`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用在会话状态中存储值方法。The following example shows how to store values in session state by using the method. 它还演示如何使用在会话状态中删除值方法。It also shows how to remove values in session state by using the method. 一个控件用于在网页上显示内容会话状态。A control is used to display the contents session state on the Web page. 方法用来循环访问会话状态集合和填充控件。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 获取或设置当前会话的字符集标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

value.span: 当前会话的字符集标识符。

span.span: The character-set identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符集 （代码页） 用于解释多字节字符数据，确定的字符值，并因此排序顺序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multi-byte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 代码页设置仅适用于多字节字符数据，不为 Unicode 字符数据。Code-page settings apply only to multi-byte character data, not to Unicode character data. 这属性提供为了与 ASP 的早期版本仅兼容。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页面向后的兼容性，使用属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCookieless As Boolean
public: property bool IsCookieless { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示会话 ID 是嵌入在 URL 中还是存储在 HTTP Cookie 中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the session ID is embedded in the URL or stored in an HTTP cookie.

value.span: 如果会话嵌入在 URL 中，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the session is embedded in the URL; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 唯一地标识与每个浏览器会话。ASP.NET identifies sessions uniquely with each browser. 默认情况下，在浏览器中不会过期的会话 cookie 中存储会话的唯一标识符。By default, the unique identifier for a session is stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser. 可以指定会话标识符不存储在 cookie 中通过设置`cookieless`属性为`true`配置元素中。You can specify that session identifiers not be stored in a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute to `true` in the configuration element. > [!NOTE] > 若要提高你的应用程序的安全性，你的应用程序应允许的用户注销，此时它应调用方法。To improve the security of your application, your application should allow users to log out, at which point it should call the method. 这减少了潜在的不需要在 URL 中使用的唯一标识符，以检索存储在用户会话中的专用数据的源。This reduces the potential for an unwanted source using the unique identifier in the URL to retrieve private data stored in the session for a user. ASP.NET 通过自动在页面的 URL 中插入一个唯一的会话 ID 维护无 cookie 会话状态。ASP.NET maintains cookieless session state by automatically inserting a unique session ID into the page's URL. 例如，ASP.NET 包括唯一的会话 ID lit3py55t21z5v55vlm25s55 已被修改以下 URL:For example, the following URL has been modified by ASP.NET to include the unique session ID lit3py55t21z5v55vlm25s55: ``` http://www.example.com/(S(4danlfat035muve4g0mvgfrr))/orderform.aspx ``` ASP.NET 修改通过在链接中嵌入会话 ID 值，然后将每个页面发送到浏览器中所有请求的页面包含的链接。ASP.NET modifies the links contained in all requested pages by embedding a session-ID value in the links just before sending each page to the browser. 会话状态，只要用户按照该站点提供的链接的路径。Session state is maintained as long as the user follows the path of links that the site provides. 但是，如果用户代理重写 URL，将会丢失会话状态实例。However, if the user agent rewrites a URL, the session-state instance will be lost. 之后的斜杠之后的应用程序名称和任何剩余的文件或虚拟目录标识符之前，在 URL 中嵌入会话 ID。The session ID is embedded in the URL after the slash that follows the application name and before any remaining file or virtual-directory identifier. 这使 ASP.NET 可以解决应用程序名称，然后涉及请求中。This allows ASP.NET to resolve the application name before involving the in the request. 默认情况下，使用无 cookie 会话中的会话标识符将被回收。By default, session identifiers used in cookieless sessions are recycled. 也就是说，如果已过期的会话 id 请求时，被启动新的会话使用随请求一起提供的会话 ID。That is, if a request is made with a session ID that has expired, a new session is started using the session ID supplied with the request. 此行为可能导致不需要共享会话数据，包含无 cookie 会话 ID 的链接进行共享时使用多个浏览器，可能是通过搜索引擎或其他程序。This behavior can result in the unwanted sharing of session data when a link that contains a cookieless session ID is shared with multiple browsers, perhaps through a search engine or other program. 您可以降低多个客户端通过禁用会话标识符的回收共享会话数据的可能性。You can reduce the possibility of session data being shared by multiple clients by disabling the recycling of session identifiers. 若要执行此操作，设置`regenerateExpiredSessionId`到配置元素属性的`true`。To do this, set the `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute of the configuration element to `true`. 这将导致无 cookie 会话请求由过期的会话 id 时，将生成新的会话 IDThis will result in a new session ID being generated when a cookieless session request is made with an expired session ID. 请注意，如果具有过期的会话 ID 发出的请求使用 HTTP`POST`方法，则发送的所有数据都将丢失时`regenerateExpiredSessionId`是`true`，如 ASP.NET 执行重定向，以确保浏览器在 URL 中具有新的会话标识符。Note that if the request made with the expired session ID uses the HTTP `POST` method, then any posted data will be lost when `regenerateExpiredSessionId` is `true`, as ASP.NET performs a redirect to ensure that the browser has the new session identifier in the URL. > [!NOTE] > 虽然设置`regenerateExpiredSessionId`归于`true`减少的可能性的不需要共享会话数据，它不会保护对通过获取访问另一个用户的会话不需要源值和其包括在对服务器的请求。While setting the `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attribute to `true` reduces the possibility of unwanted sharing of session data, it does not protect against an unwanted source gaining access to the session of another user by obtaining the value and including it in requests to the server. 如果要在会话状态中存储私有或敏感信息，建议使用 SSL 来加密在浏览器和包括的服务器之间的任何通信。If you are storing private or sensitive information in session state, it is recommended that you use SSL to encrypt any communication between the browser and server that includes the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`cookieless`会话属性为 true 的 Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `cookieless` session attribute to true in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供为了与 ASP 的早期版本仅兼容。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页面向后的兼容性，使用属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不在会话状态中存储的区域设置标识符。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 属性访问属性来获取和设置的标识符。The property accesses the property to get and set the identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何配置服务器以进行信息或会话状态存储，请参阅[ASP.NET 会话状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For information about how to configure your server for or session-state storage, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`mode`会话属性设置为Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `mode` session attribute to in the Web.config file. 对于 SQL Server 会话模式，`sqlConnectionString`属性也是必需。For SQL Server session mode, the `sqlConnectionString` attribute is also required. ``` ```

span.span: Deletes an item from the session-state collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果会话状态集合不包含具有指定的元素`name`，集合保持不变。If the session-state collection does not contain an element with the specified `name`, the collection remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用在会话状态中存储值方法。The following example shows how to store values in session state by using the method. 它还演示如何使用在会话状态中删除值方法。It also shows how to remove values in session state by using the method. 一个控件用于在网页上显示会话状态的内容。A control is used to display the contents of session state on the Web page. 方法用来循环访问会话状态集合和填充控件。The method is used to iterate through the session-state collection and populate the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpSessionState#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/HttpSessionStateAddCS.aspx#13)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpSessionState#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/HttpSessionStateAddVB.aspx#13)]

Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SessionID As String
public: property System::String ^ SessionID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取会话的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier for the session.
The unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于唯一地标识与服务器上的会话数据的浏览器。The property is used to uniquely identify a browser with session data on the server. 值是随机由 ASP.NET 生成并存储在浏览器中不会过期的会话 cookie。The value is randomly generated by ASP.NET and stored in a non-expiring session cookie in the browser. 值然后发送包含 ASP.NET 应用程序的每个请求的 cookie 中。The value is then sent in a cookie with each request to the ASP.NET application. 如果你想要禁用使用 ASP.NET 应用程序中的 cookie 并仍进行的会话状态使用，您可以配置你的应用程序通过设置 URL 而不是一个 cookie 中存储的会话标识符`cookieless`配置的属性元素`true`，或设置为，你的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。If you want to disable the use of cookies in your ASP.NET application and still make use of session state, you can configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL instead of a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element to `true`, or to , in the Web.config file for your application. 您可以确定是否支持 cookie 的浏览器通过指定的值的 ASP.NET为`cookieless`属性。You can have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are supported by the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 您还可以确定是否启用 cookie 的浏览器通过指定的值的 ASP.NET为`cookieless`属性。You can also have ASP.NET determine whether cookies are enabled for the browser by specifying a value of for the `cookieless` attribute. 如果支持 cookie，则当已指定，或者当已启用指定，则的会话标识符将存储在 cookie 中，否则为将在 URL 中存储的会话标识符。If cookies are supported when is specified, or enabled when is specified, then the session identifier will be stored in a cookie; otherwise the session identifier will be stored in the URL. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 以明文形式，在 cookie 中或在 URL 中发送服务器和浏览器之间。The is sent between the server and the browser in clear text, either in a cookie or in the URL. 因此，不需要的源能获得访问权限的另一个用户会话，通过获取值并将其包括在对服务器的请求。As a result, an unwanted source could gain access to the session of another user by obtaining the value and including it in requests to the server. 如果要在会话状态中存储私有或敏感信息，建议使用 SSL 来加密在浏览器和包括的服务器之间的任何通信。If you are storing private or sensitive information in session state, it is recommended that you use SSL to encrypt any communication between the browser and server that includes the . 在使用基于 cookie 的会话状态时，ASP.NET 不会分配存储之前的会话数据使用对象。When using cookie-based session state, ASP.NET does not allocate storage for session data until the object is used. 因此，新的会话 ID 生成的每个页请求访问会话对象之前。As a result, a new session ID is generated for each page request until the session object is accessed. 如果你的应用程序需要静态会话 ID 在整个会话期间，可实现`Session_Start`方法在应用程序的 Global.asax 文件和将数据存储在对象解决问题的会话 ID，也可以使用中的另一个部分的代码您的应用程序中的数据，从而显式存储对象。If your application requires a static session ID for the entire session, you can either implement the `Session_Start` method in the application's Global.asax file and store data in the object to fix the session ID, or you can use code in another part of your application to explicitly store data in the object. 如果你的应用程序使用无 cookie 会话状态，会话 ID 生成的第一个页面视图，并且会保留整个会话。If your application uses cookieless session state, the session ID is generated on the first page view and is maintained for the entire session. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 Web.config 文件，用于配置要使用无 cookie 会话标识符的会话状态。The following code example shows a Web.config file that configures session state to use cookieless session identifiers. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ``` ```

span.span: Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection
public: property System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ StaticObjects { System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 ASP.NET 应用程序文件 Global.asax 中的 标记声明的对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects declared by tags within the ASP.NET application file Global.asax.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含在 Global.asax 文件中声明的对象。

span.span: An containing objects declared in the Global.asax file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果页面上的对象不支持序列化并是进程外 (或)，该对象将不会创建并将不会添加到此集合。If an object on a page does not support serialization and is out-of-process ( or ), the object will not be created and will not be added to this collection. 与 ASP 的早期版本的兼容性提供属性。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了`id`以及中对象的对象类型集合。The following code example lists the `id` and object type of the objects in the collection. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取并设置在会话状态提供程序终止会话之前各请求之间所允许的时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: Gets and sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

value.span: 超时时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以在应用程序中使用的 Web.config 文件中设置`timeout`属性的配置元素，或者你可以设置直接使用应用程序代码的属性值。The property can be set in the Web.config file for an application using the `timeout` attribute of the configuration element, or you can set the property value directly using application code. 属性不能设置为一个值大于 525600 分钟 （1 年）。The property cannot be set to a value greater than 525,600 minutes (1 year). 默认值为 20 分钟。The default value is 20 minutes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`timeout`30 分钟到 Web.config 文件中的会话属性。The following code example sets the `timeout` session attribute to 30 minutes in the Web.config file. ``` ```

span.span: Session State Overview
